resources.string: Customizes the API source for ColorOS Breeno AI Assistant\'s model, compatible with the OpenAI protocol.
Please enter a valid proxy, e.g.: 1.2.3.4:5678
Please enter a valid URL. It must start with \'https://\' or \'http://\'
Oops! Something went wrong. Send an error report?
URL can be auto-completed, do you want to?
The quality of these tool calls is related to the model\'s intelligence~\nCalls may fail due to API protocol differences.
API key for the large language model
URL for the large language model API. !! Must be a complete URL !!
Model ID for the large language model, e.g., o4-mini
Describes the LLM\'s requirements / performance or the role it should play
Custom API connection timeout in seconds
Socks proxy for traffic (leave blank to disable)
Show LLM\'s tool calling in the chat (for debugging)
URI capabilities include (dispatching to other apps): opening web pages, making phone calls, launching maps, playing media, etc.
Allow LLM to view device info (time, battery, etc.)
Allow LLM to execute shell command
Fallback to Breeno when keywords are included (Experimental)
Enable to use Breeno\'s original functions, such as setting alarms (leave blank to disable)
Running shell commands with Root access can brick your device. We are not responsible for any damage, so please use this feature at your own risk.
Enable Root (Requires Breeno Assistance to have Root access)
Enable to use blacklist mode, prohibiting the commands in the list; otherwise, enable whitelist mode, allowing only the commands in the list.
Using new line to split keywords or complete cmd, e.g., reboot„ÄÅrm -rf *
